name: Cake Match
description:
Cake Match is a beautiful & fun match 3 game, it is very easy to play: just swipe the cakes to connect 3 or more of the same type before time runs out.

Features:
- Fun Challenging Match 3 gameplay
- Beautiful Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- 2 different game modes: Arcade & Tactical
- Collect many items to trigger special effects
- Lots of Levels to complete
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close any time and resume later
- Play Fullscreen or Windowed

An Addictive game for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
